questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a category of work protected under copyright?
questions.explanation: Industrial designs are protected under the Designs Act, not the Copyright Act.

questions.question: A poem written by a student is protected as what type of work?
questions.explanation: Poems are considered literary works under copyright law.

questions.question: Which of the following would be classified as a musical work?
questions.explanation: Musical works refer to the composition itself, not the sound recording.

questions.question: Under Indian law, cinematograph films include which of the following?
questions.explanation: Cinematograph films include any visual recording like movies, videos, or ads.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of an artistic work?
questions.explanation: Sculptures, drawings, and paintings are examples of artistic works.

questions.question: A film’s background score is protected as what type of work?
questions.explanation: The background score is a musical work separate from the sound recording of the film.

questions.question: What kind of work is a computer program under Indian copyright law?
questions.explanation: Computer programs are classified as literary works.

questions.question: Which of the following best defines a dramatic work?
options: A play or choreography script meant for performance
A painting displayed in a museum
questions.explanation: Dramatic works include plays, choreography, and scripts designed for performance.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a sound recording?
questions.explanation: A CD or any medium with recorded sound qualifies as a sound recording.

questions.question: Which of these Indian examples qualifies as an artistic work?
options: Logo of the State Bank of India
questions.explanation: The SBI logo is an artistic work under Indian copyright law.

questions.question: Which of the following combinations is correct?
questions.explanation: A poem is a literary work as per copyright classification.

questions.question: What distinguishes a sound recording from a musical work?
options: A sound recording is the recorded performance, not the composition itself
A musical work must be recorded to exist
questions.explanation: Sound recordings are tangible forms of recorded sound; musical works are the written or composed notes.

questions.question: Which of the following can be both literary and dramatic in nature?
questions.explanation: A play script is literary when written and dramatic when performed.

questions.question: What is protected in a cinematograph film?
options: The visual and sound recording together as one work
questions.explanation: Cinematograph films protect the combined audio-visual experience.

questions.question: Which type of work would a painting fall under?
questions.explanation: Paintings are classic examples of artistic works.

questions.question: Which of these qualifies as a literary work in the digital world?
questions.explanation: Source code and digital text are literary works in electronic form.

questions.question: The choreography of a dance performance is protected as:
questions.explanation: Dance choreography and scripts fall under dramatic works.

questions.question: A movie poster designed by an artist would be protected as:
questions.explanation: Posters and visual illustrations are artistic works.

questions.question: An audio recording of an interview is classified as:
questions.explanation: An audio recording of any spoken or musical content is a sound recording.

questions.question: A short film created on a smartphone is protected under:
questions.explanation: Any visual moving recording is a cinematograph film under copyright.

questions.question: Lyrics of a Bollywood song are an example of:
questions.explanation: Lyrics are written text and fall under literary works.

questions.question: A hand-drawn comic strip is protected as:
questions.explanation: Comics have both text and art components — both protected categories.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a dramatic work?
questions.explanation: A song recording is a sound recording, not a dramatic work.

questions.question: Which of these examples shows overlap of multiple work types?
options: A film with dialogues, music, and visuals
A poem written in a book
questions.explanation: A film combines literary, musical, and artistic elements — all protected together.

questions.question: Why is software treated as a literary work?
options: Because it involves written code similar to text
Because it is used in media
questions.explanation: Software is written code and is treated like a literary text.
